ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are in need of Charisma go to the Qeynos aquaducts. Drosco is green to me at lvl 15 and he was before at lvl 12. The order of thunder medalion also
ygData.messageBody:
If you are in need of Charisma go to the Qeynos aquaducts. Drosco is green
to me at lvl 15 and he was before at lvl 12. The order of thunder medalion
also gives aff light like a lightstone along with its 2ac and +5 chr

Trevalien


>From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>Date: Mon, 30 Aug 1999 13:59:38 EDT
>
>From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
>
>Drosco drpos one of the 2 diferent order of thunder medalions. Droscos
>version is 2ac +5 chr and is lore and no drop.
>
>Trevalien
>
>
>>From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>>To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>>Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>>Date: Mon, 30 Aug 1999 12:55:24 -0500
>>
>>From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>>
>>Medal of Merit comes from a Qeynos Quest. Not sure which one though(could
>>be Drosco the zombie that drops this down the sewers). I bought the item
>>off a guy for 5pp a while back though. Opallines come off the Barkeep in
>>Unrest. Crude Stein comes off Ogre Bouncers in Feerrot. You can pick em
>>up
>>for about 100pp off players though.
>>
>> > -----Original Message-----
>> > From: Whitcraft,David [SMTP:DWHITCRAFT@...]
>> > Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 12:54 PM
>> > To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
>> > Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>> >
>> > From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>> >
>> > sheesh...where ye getting these items? Might have to try and pick me up
>> > some
>> > of them...
>> >
>> > -----Original Message-----
>> > From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@...]
>> > Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 12:47 PM
>> > To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
>> > Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>> >
>> >
>> > From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>> >
>> > Hehe I'm a barb shaman and I get 240 =) *beams a glistening 105 point
>> > charisma smile*
>> >
>> > I have the base 60 charisma, Spirit of the Snake(now Alluring Aura),
>>two
>> > Opalline Earrings, a Medal of Merit and a crude stein. I sell to Iago
>>in
>> > East Karana.
>> >
>> > > -----Original Message-----
>> > > From: Whitcraft,David [SMTP:DWHITCRAFT@...]
>> > > Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 12:44 PM
>> > > To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
>> > > Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>> > >
>> > > From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>> > >
>> > > The *right* person can sell them for 240pp (the right one being a CHA
>> > > maxed
>> > > enchanter with their spells on). My Barbarian shaman could sell them
>>for
>> > > about 198pp I think.
>> > >
>> > > -----Original Message-----
>> > > From: Trevalien [mailto:trevalien@...]
>> > > Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 12:14 PM
>> > > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>> > > Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>> > >
>> > >
>> > > From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
>> > >
>> > > Just out of curiosity, can someone see what a pair of crafted
>>gauntlets
>> > > sells for to a merchant? (just be careful u dont actualy sell them!)
>>I
>> > was
>> > >
>> > > in Felwithe (on povar) the other day and found that someone had sold
>>a
>> > > pair
>> > > to a merchant (the merchant wanted about 3200pp) I know how merchants
>> > work
>> > >
>> > > and I figure that he might have goten 50-100pp. There was also some
>> > other
>> > > items that i was amazed that anyone would sell but i forget what they
>> > were
>> > >
>> > > (i think a BIBS was in there)
>> > >
>> > > Trevalien
>> > >
>> > > >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>> > > >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>> > > >To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>> > > >Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted bracer

>> > > >
>> > > >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>> > > >
>> > > >I got to do this quest over the weekend. It take a sapphire (normal
>>gem
>> > > >store sapphire, about 100pp), and a "bunch of optic nerves" from an
>> > evil
>> > > >eye. A 'bunch' (I think it's called a bunch, it's optic nerves
>>anyways)
>> > > is
>> > > >ONE item. goodluck!
>> > > >
>> > > >-----Original Message-----
>> > > >From: Jonathan [mailto:jp1234@...]
>> > > >Sent: Sunday, August 29, 1999 2:25 AM
>> > > >To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>> > > >Subject: [EQCheats] Crafted bracer
>> > > >
>> > > >
>> > > >The optic nerves for the quest require 'a bunch of optic nerves'
>>right?
>> > > >They werent no drop so I'm not sure..
>> > > >
